member.name: T:Wisej.Web.Ext.Polymer.PolymerComponent
member.summary: Represents a polymer (https://elements.polymer-project.org/) non-visual component. Used to import polymer libraries, such as iron-icons sets and others.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.Polymer.PolymerComponent.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.Polymer.PolymerComponent.#ctor(System.ComponentModel.IContainer)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class together with the specified container.
member.param: A that represents the container for the component.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.Polymer.PolymerComponent.PolymerBaseUrl
member.summary: Returns or sets the base url for the polymer files.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.Polymer.PolymerComponent.Imports
member.summary: Returns or sets the list of polymer libraries to import.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.Polymer.PolymerComponent.Site
member.summary: Returns or sets the associated with the .
member.returns: The object associated with the component; or null, if the component does not have a site.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.Polymer.PolymerComponent.DesignMode
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the is currently in design mode.
member.returns: true if the is in design mode; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.Polymer.PolymerComponent.OnWebRender(System.Object)
member.summary: Renders the client component.

member.name: T:Wisej.Web.Ext.Polymer.PolymerWidget
member.summary: Represents a polymer (https://elements.polymer-project.org/) widget.

member.name: E:Wisej.Web.Ext.Polymer.PolymerWidget.PolymerEvent
member.summary: Fired when the widget fires an event.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.Polymer.PolymerWidget.OnPolymerEvent(Wisej.Web.WidgetEventArgs)
member.summary: Fires the event.
member.param: A that contains the event data.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.Polymer.PolymerWidget.AllowHtml
member.summary: Enables HTML content in the Text property.
member.remarks:
Newlines (CRLF) are converted to
when allowHtml is false, or when allowHtml is true and the text doesn't contain any html.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.Polymer.PolymerWidget.BorderStyle
member.summary: Indicates the border style for the control.
member.returns: One of the values. The default is BorderStyle.None.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.Polymer.PolymerWidget.Text
member.summary: Returns or sets the HTML content associated with this polymer widget.
member.returns: The inner HTML content of the polymer widget.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.Polymer.PolymerWidget.ElementType
member.summary: Returns or sets the polymer element type.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.Polymer.PolymerWidget.ElementClassName
member.summary: Returns or sets the polymer element class name.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.Polymer.PolymerWidget.Events
member.summary: Returns or sets the events from the polymer widget to handle on the server side.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.Polymer.PolymerWidget.Properties
member.summary: Returns or sets the specified property values on the polymer widget and defines the properties to receive back when an event is fired.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.Polymer.PolymerWidget.OnEnabledChanged(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Fires the event.
member.param: An that contains the event data.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.Polymer.PolymerWidget.Update
member.summary: Updates the widget definition on the client.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.Polymer.PolymerWidget.OnWebEvent(Wisej.Core.WisejEventArgs)
member.summary: Processes the event from the client.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.Polymer.PolymerWidget.OnWebRender(System.Object)
member.summary: Renders the client component.
